attributes.action: Stop the unnecessary delivery of Junk Mail and flyers at this time
attributes.additional_details: The isolation of people at risk should mean they only have contact with items as a necessity and Junk Mail and Flyers are not a necessity,  yes the Mail must be delivered but when junk is going through every door.
attributes.background: Junk Mail and flyers being delivered indiscriminately through our doors via the Royal Mail, a Post Person, who could be infected with COVID19, delivers SPAM mail and flyers to people who are classed as at risk it totally negates the lock down and preventative measures for no valid reason
